title: New: Gospel Kid – Train
body:
Back in early 2010’s, **Cari Rae** was a member of a duo out of New York known as **Blonds**.

Much has changed since then, and well, let’s just say the other half of the now defunct duo is doing quité well for himself… but enough about that. Re-emerging yesterday with her debut solo track _Train_, released under the moniker **Gospel Kid**, it’s bold, haunting and focuses heavily on her lyrical proficiency. A slow burner, underpinned by an eerie whistling section, for a rather simplistic track, it packs a real punch.
